quest.name: Sweet Temptations
journal:
 Quest Sync
The earnest observer casts his gaze hither and yon, as if searching for something.
objectives: Use aetheric rope on agavoides young to capture them.
Deliver the agavoides young to the earnest observer.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Bah, where in the world could the rest have gotten to...?

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Ah, friend familiar! If you have a moment, I require help rounding up our agavoides young.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Six remain unaccounted for, and I would be most grateful if you could search for them with me.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: The creatures secrete nectar from their tails, which attracts insects; where they swarm, you are like to find an agavoides. And when you do, use this aetheric rope to catch it.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Small as they are, I don't believe they will be too far away. Let us endeavor to find three each and then reconvene here.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The agavoides young lies unmoving─attempting to lure butterflies, it would seem.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned as well. I managed to find three. How about yourself?

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Wonderful, this accounts for all of them! We can finally release the creatures.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Lest you wonder, the agavoides were created to curb the insect population. They have passed the first phase of determination, and thus will be provisionally sent out into the wider world.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: Though a few steps remain before they can fully take their place in nature, I've no doubt but that they will make our star a better place.

dialogue.name: GALLANTOBSERVER04280
dialogue.text: This isn't much, but please accept it by way of my gratitude for your assistance.
